The '''Adepti Seeker's Stove''' is a consumable [[Forge]]d [[gadget]] that creates a stove in front of the player. Upon use, the gadget will enter cooldown for 300 seconds. After the cooldown period is over, the Adepti Seeker's Stove will automatically disappear.

Reach [[Reputation]] Level 5 in [[Liyue]] to obtain [[Diagram: Adepti Seeker's Stove]].
